hm2RemoteAuthMib.name: hm2RemoteAuthMib
hm2RemoteAuthMib.contactinfo: Postal: Stuttgarter Str. 45-51 72654 Neckartenzlingen Germany Phone: +49 7127 140 E-mail: hac.support@belden.com
hm2RemoteAuthMib.description: Hirschmann MIB for remote authentication protocols. Copyright (C) 2014. All Rights Reserved.

hm2LdapClientAdminState.name: hm2LdapClientAdminState
hm2LdapClientAdminState.description: Enables/disables the LDAP client admin mode.

hm2LdapClientCacheTimeout.name: hm2LdapClientCacheTimeout
hm2LdapClientCacheTimeout.description: Configures the LDAP user cache entry timeout in minutes. Default timeout value is 10 minutes.

hm2LdapClientServerBaseDN.name: hm2LdapClientServerBaseDN
hm2LdapClientServerBaseDN.description: Base distinguished name for LDAP query to remote authentication server.

hm2LdapClientServerSearchAttribute.name: hm2LdapClientServerSearchAttribute
hm2LdapClientServerSearchAttribute.description: Search attribute for LDAP query to remote authentication server, e.g. 'userPrincipalName'.

hm2LdapClientServerBindUser.name: hm2LdapClientServerBindUser
hm2LdapClientServerBindUser.description: User name of user that has permission to do user requests on a remote authentication server.

hm2LdapClientServerBindUserPasswd.name: hm2LdapClientServerBindUserPasswd
hm2LdapClientServerBindUserPasswd.description: Password of user that has permission to do user requests on a remote authentication server.

hm2LdapClientServerDefaultDomain.name: hm2LdapClientServerDefaultDomain
hm2LdapClientServerDefaultDomain.description: Default domain used for users without a domain name.

hm2LdapClientTlsVersions.name: hm2LdapClientTlsVersions
hm2LdapClientTlsVersions.description: The TLS version supported by the LDAP client.

hm2LdapClientTlsCipherSuites.name: hm2LdapClientTlsCipherSuites
hm2LdapClientTlsCipherSuites.description: The cipher suite supported by the LDAP client.

hm2LdapClientServerAddrTable.name: hm2LdapClientServerAddrTable
hm2LdapClientServerAddrTable.description: This table contains objects to configure client connections to remote authentication server(s).

hm2LdapClientServerIndex.name: hm2LdapClientServerIndex
hm2LdapClientServerIndex.description: Index for remote authentication server table.

hm2LdapClientServerDescr.name: hm2LdapClientServerDescr
hm2LdapClientServerDescr.description: The description of the server configured.

hm2LdapClientServerAddr.name: hm2LdapClientServerAddr
hm2LdapClientServerAddr.description: IP address of remote authentication server.

hm2LdapClientServerPort.name: hm2LdapClientServerPort
hm2LdapClientServerPort.description: The port number of the remote authentication server.

hm2LdapClientServerSecurity.name: hm2LdapClientServerSecurity
hm2LdapClientServerSecurity.description: Configures connection security options. - none -> connection to AD server is unprotected. (Attention: passwords are transmitted as plain text) - ssl -> SSL connection is established between device and AD server and AD server certificate is proved valid with loaded certificate authority (CA certificate). - startTLS -> TLS connection is established between device and AD server and AD server certificate is proved valid with loaded certificate authority (CA certificate).

hm2LdapClientServerStatus.name: hm2LdapClientServerStatus
hm2LdapClientServerStatus.description: Status of authentication against remote authentication server: - ok -> Server reachable, authentication succeeded - unreachable -> Server (primary and backup) not reachable - other -> any other error state

hm2LdapClientServerRowStatus.name: hm2LdapClientServerRowStatus
hm2LdapClientServerRowStatus.description: Indicates the status of an entry in this table, and is used to create/delete entries. Objects within this table can by changed while the status is 'active'.

hm2LdapRoleMatchingPolicy.name: hm2LdapRoleMatchingPolicy
hm2LdapRoleMatchingPolicy.description: Configures the way role mapping table entries are applied. If set to first (2) the first matching entry determines the user's role. If set to highest (1) the the matching entry with the highest role is used.

hm2LdapRoleMappingTable.name: hm2LdapRoleMappingTable
hm2LdapRoleMappingTable.description: This table contains string objects to configure the mapping to an available user role.

hm2LdapRoleMappingIndex.name: hm2LdapRoleMappingIndex
hm2LdapRoleMappingIndex.description: Index for remote authentication role mapping table.

hm2LdapRoleMappingAccessRole.name: hm2LdapRoleMappingAccessRole
hm2LdapRoleMappingAccessRole.description: The access role to be mapped.

hm2LdapRoleMappingParameter.name: hm2LdapRoleMappingParameter
hm2LdapRoleMappingParameter.description: The search string for the entry. For hm2LdapRoleMappingType attribute(1) this is in the form attribute=value. For hm2LdapRoleMappingType group(2) this is the group.

hm2LdapRoleMappingRowStatus.name: hm2LdapRoleMappingRowStatus
hm2LdapRoleMappingRowStatus.description: Indicates the status of an entry in this table, and is used to create/delete entries. Objects within this table can by changed while the status is 'active'.

hm2LdapSESDuplicateIPorHost.name: hm2LdapSESDuplicateIPorHost
hm2LdapSESDuplicateIPorHost.description: Indicates that there exists a remote authentication client server entry with the same IP address or host name.

hm2LdapConfigStatusTrap.name: hm2LdapConfigStatusTrap
hm2LdapConfigStatusTrap.description: This notification is send when authentication via Ldap to a remote authentication server is done.
